sqlMap.insert: insert into EXAMPLE_USER (id, userAccount, userType, created, modified) values (#id#, #userAccount#, #userType#, sysdate, sysdate)
sqlMap.select: select id, userAccount, userType, created, modified from EXAMPLE_USER
select count(*) as value from EXAMPLE_USER

select /*+ordered use_nl(t1,t2)*/ t2.id, t2.userAccount, t2.userType, t2.created, t2.modified from (select rid from (select r.rid, rownum linenum from (select rowid rid from EXAMPLE_USER t
order by t.id desc) r WHERE rownum <= #endRow#) WHERE linenum >= #startRow#) t1, example t2 where t1.rid = t2.rowid

select * from (select t.*, rownum linenum from ( select id, userAccount, userType, created, modified from EXAMPLE_USER t
order by t.id desc ) t WHERE rownum <= #endRow#) t WHERE linenum >= #startRow#
